u.a: <bef> sits in high chair with toys . manipulates toys
<bef> opens Nestles . <1w> puts down on Tom's tray .
<1w> holds out spoon to Tom . <aft> holds can . stands in front of Tom
takes spoon and dishes out into cup
<1w> struggles with can . <1w> spoons out of can
<bef> spoons . picks up cup and looks inside . <dur> holds up cup
<aft> puts down on table . stirs Tom's milk . gets plate and puts on table . gets tuna
<aft> picks up bowl , puts down on table . brings tuna . helps dish out
holds out seasoning bottle to Tom . helps Tom
looks at dish . points to phone . looks at phone
<1w> puts away juice . walks around in kitchen
waves spoon at Mother . looks at Mother
<bef> looks at Mother . smiles . <dur> gestures with spoon to Mother
